sidebar.description: This will help us discover the ideal plant for you.

welcome-section.description: Answer a few simple questions and get personalized plant recommendations based on your space, lifestyle, and preferences.

payment-success.title: Congratulations!
payment-success.subtitle: Congratulations on your purchase!
payment-success.description: To get started, scan the QR code below to open the app you’ve unlocked. Your login details have also been sent to your email.
payment-success.description-1: Your personalized plant guide is ready. You’ve also unlocked premium access to our plant care tools. Use the login information sent to your email to access your account.
payment-success.description-2: Scan the QR code with your phone camera to access the app directly.
payment-success.mobile-description: Start your journey to thriving, healthy plants today!

result.description: Ready to start growing? Take good care of your new plant friends with these easy to follow tips!
